pr_title: Fix created logs are not added into processorLogs

timeline.bodyText: I'm not much a fan of easymock. Wouldn't this easy possible to do with mockito?
timeline.author: farodin91
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,79 @@

+package org.janusgraph.graphdb.log;
+
+import org.easymock.EasyMockSupport;

replies.bodyText: Sure, I will change it to mockito
replies.author: porunov

timeline.message:
Fix created logs are not added into processorLogs

Fixes #1281 that was causing removeLogProcessor (shutdown on the log processor) to not work as expected

Signed-off-by: Oleksandr Porunov <alexandr.porunov@gmail.com>

Fix created logs are not added into processorLogs

Fixes #1281 that was causing removeLogProcessor (shutdown on the log processor) to not work as expected

Signed-off-by: Oleksandr Porunov <alexandr.porunov@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid unused imports such as 'org.mockito.Mockito'
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

replies.bodyText: when, mock, anyString is used by this import. Cidacy do not detect it
replies.author: porunov
